entities.name: mediwizards
entities.description: The team that Harry is a part of, described as looking surlier than ever and refusing to let the Irish players mop them up. (Excerpt: 'He looked surlier than ever and refused to let them mop him up.')

entities.name: irish
entities.description: The opposing team, described as dancing gleefully in a shower of gold descending from their mascots. (Excerpt: 'the Irish players were dancing gleefully in a shower of gold descending from their mascots.')

entities.name: veela
entities.description: A supernatural species, described as shrinking back into their usual beautiful selves. (Excerpt: 'the veela were shrink-ing back into their usual, beautiful selves now...')

entities.name: bulgarian minister of magic
entities.description: A person who speaks English and is the Minister of Magic for Bulgaria. (Excerpt: 'It was the Bulgarian Minister of Magic.')

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A person who sounds outraged when speaking to the Bulgarian Minister of Magic. (Excerpt: 'You can speak English!' said Fudge, sounding outraged.)

relationships.description: The mediwizards team is described as opposing the Irish team. (Excerpt: 'He looked surlier than ever and refused to let them mop him up.')
The Bulgarian Minister of Magic is speaking to Fudge. (Excerpt: 'It was the Bulgarian Minister of Magic.')
